Description: Finger-ring comprising an off-white agate scarab with large brown spot on back (elytra marked, humeral callosities present, pierced longitudinally, base undecorated) mounted, by means of metal pins, to a horse-shoe hoop of grooved sheet gold terminating in roundels, decorated with incised annules and granulation.
Acquisition name: Bequeathed by: Rev W F Rose
